attributes.title: Worst President EVERR
attributes.review: President 🍊is wanting to take down apps down like Roblox and Tik Tok. For what reason? Ok and kids enjoy those apps but not only that he destroy the World by making an World War 3 🙄😒. 🖕🏾🖕🏾

attributes.title: i am speechless
attributes.review: i am honestly speechless. when i first downloaded and opened the app, i immediately was greeted with an overwhelming sensation of racism! not to mention the homophobia, sexism, and white supremacy that this app incites. this app feels to be run by brainwashed fox news watchers. to protect our future generations, i hope it is taken down.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!❌
attributes.review:
Repeat after me do not download!💩
1. Took forever to download then took 2 hours longest I've ever had to wait❌
2. When I got on it gave me a bug ❌
3. My phone shut down I could not get back in❌❌
4. The app is very unorganized ❌
5. When my phone power on I got on there was nothing ❌❌❌
